headline: Description:
paragraph: Experienced Graphic Designer Leader with frontend development skills in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Transitioning into a full-time frontend developer role, seeking to leverage design and technical expertise to create attractive and user-friendly websites and applications. Seeking to join a team and contribute to technology projects.

headline: Best fit roles:
paragraph:
• Jr. Visual Developer
  • Jr. Frontend Developer
  • Jr. Fullstack Developer
  • Jr. UI Developer

headline: Soft Skills:
paragraph: Extrovert team player with good communication skills, Emotional intelligence forged through +10 years of graphic design career. Product-minded and problem-solver designer and developer. Eager to learn new skills and technologies.
